hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The Muslim is obliged to obey (the ruler) whether he likes it or not, unless he is commanded to commit an act of disobedience. If he is commanded to commit a sin then he should neither listen nor obey.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ طَاعَةَ فِي مَعْصِيَةِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: There is no obedience through disobedience towards Allah
